> 
>  My Speakjet test board, using a zif (zero insertion force)

thinking use the buffer full line to gate random numbers in from a 
white noise RNG on the serial line(?). I haven't read enough of the 
manual yet about the data, if it needs to be in a certain form or 
what. Is it just bits, or is it bytes? I'm all rusty and coroded 
when it comes to digital.
